thread.title: Dry Ice Is the Rat’s Worst Enemy, de Blasio Says

author: Melanie Grayce West
title: Dry Ice Is the Rat’s Worst Enemy, de Blasio Says
text:
New York City officials opened up a new front in the war on rats at the city’s public housing developments.
At a news conference on Tuesday at the Bushwick Houses in Brooklyn, New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio said 10 New York City Housing Authority developments will get dry-ice rat abatement treatments, exterminators, new wastebaskets, trash compactors and concrete floors to cover dirt-floor basements.
Seated... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
